s_synopsis: The new millennium approaches. Turmoil, crime, and famine rule. Gangs, terrorists and violent cults lurk around every corner. As one of two cops, you must try and bring order to the city. D'arci is a young and cunning super-sleuth with unsurpassed reconnaissance and infiltration skills. As Special Forces veteran, Roper is known for his expertise in weapons and explosives. His skills are never questioned, but his mental stability is. Either one could be the hero this city is waiting for. But time is running out...
